Sentencas: A series of ceria-based nanocomposites consisting of Ce0.85La0.125Sr0.025O1.9125 (LSCO) and binary carbonate mixture Li2CO3-Na2CO3 (LNCO) have been prepared as functional electrolytes for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (LT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity in La3+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria: carbonate nanocomposite

Sentencas: These have been characterized using powder X-ray diffraction, scanning electron microscope, differential thermal analysis, and measurement of conductivity as a function of temperature using complex plane impedance analysis.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity in La3+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria: carbonate nanocomposite

Sentencas: Crystalline ceria-based single phase formation has been found in all the composites.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity in La3+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria: carbonate nanocomposite

Sentencas: Carbonates are present as an amorphous phase in the composites.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity in La3+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria: carbonate nanocomposite

Sentencas: Impedance analysis has been used to study the electrical behavior of the composites.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity in La3+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria: carbonate nanocomposite

Sentencas: A jump in the conductivity vs temperature plots has been observed in all the composites containing different carbonate contents.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity in La3+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria: carbonate nanocomposite

Sentencas: This is related to superionic transition at the interfaces.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity in La3+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria: carbonate nanocomposite

Sentencas: Conductivity of the composites increases with increasing amount of carbonate.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity in La3+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria: carbonate nanocomposite

Sentencas: This is due to the increase in the interfacial area between the two phases, which promotes interfacial interaction between them.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity in La3+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria: carbonate nanocomposite

Sentencas: Composition, LSCO/35LNCO, shows conductivity of 0.203 S cm(-1) at 500 A degrees C with an activation energy of conduction of 0.19 eV.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity in La3+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria: carbonate nanocomposite
